name: Racer (itch) (ArjunJ)
description:
Racer is a strategy, local multiplayer game where players customize their vehicles, create a strategy based on speed, time and distance graphs and place obstacles & pickups on the map to hinder the other player.

Team Lead - Nam Tran

Lead Programmer - Arjun Jain

Level Designer - Vincent Yao

Artist - Reynold Lin
